scripts.clean:reports: mkdir -p cypress/reports && rm -R -f cypress/reports/* && mkdir cypress/reports/mochareports
scripts.posttest: npm run combine-reports && npm run generate-report
scripts.test: npm run scripts || npm run posttest
scripts.chrome:test: npm run pretest && npm run chrome:scripts || npm run posttest
scripts.firefox:test: npm run pretest && npm run firefox:scripts || npm run posttest
